arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Aston Villa – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Newly-promoted Sunderland aim to continue their impressive start to the season on Sunday when they host an Aston Villa side yet to score a league goal. The Black Cats have turned the Stadium of Light into a fortress, winning both of their home games so far. However, that record will be tested by Villa manager […] The post Sunderland vs Aston Villa – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa XI vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: The pressure is mounting on Unai Emery as he takes his Aston Villa side to Sunderland on Sunday, desperate to end a historically poor start to the season. The Villans are in the relegation zone, having failed to score in their opening four league games, a miserable run compounded by a midweek cup exit that […] The post Aston Villa XI vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Starting XI: Two changes forecast for Sunderland vs Aston Villa
arts.sum: Last time out the lads got a credible draw with Crystal Palace, however Enzo Le Fee’s injury meant we missed out on his creative spark. Le Fee’s available again today, so will he come straight back into the team? Dan Ballard is available as well after missing out on the last couple of games through […]

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs. Villa injury, suspension list, predicted XIs

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Aston Villa predictions: Villans can seal first Premier League win
arts.sum: It has been a frustrating start to the Premier League season for Aston Villa but Ross Kilvington believes they can get their first goal and first win against Sunderland on Sunday.

arts.sum: 'Apologies again to Sunderland fans... they can hammer me again this week if I'm wrong.'
